pages.title: Immersive Petroleum
pages.text: Immersive Petroleum is a lightweight content add-on for Immersive Engineering that introduces oil, oil extraction, and oil processing to the mod's tech progression.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: First, you must locate an oil deposit buried deep below bedrock, The Core Sample Drill can be used to detect these reservoirs. Once a source of oil is discovered, Pumpjacks can be built to pump the Crude Oil to the surface.$(br2)Everything else from there can be found in your Immersive Engineering Manual.
